task.title: Generating a local table of contents

context.p: If a topic contains several child topics, XSLT-Conref allows you to generate an overview of these child topics. This implementation does not use a use case-specific specialization. The attribute xcr:xsl is inserted in a ul element, and the XSLT script local-toc.xsl provides the required content.

The overview of child topics is similar to an extended table of contents, which is displayed in the body of the parent topic. The overview shows the title, the short description, and a link to the child topic in an itemized list.
